text.__SUMMARY__:
The greater long-fingered bat (Miniopterus inflatus) is a species of vesper bat in the family Vespertilionidae.
It is found in Cameroon, Central African Republic, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Equatorial Guinea, Ethiopia, Gabon, Guinea, Kenya, Liberia, Mozambique, Namibia, Rwanda, Tanzania, Uganda, and Zimbabwe.
It roosts in caves.
